resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106086</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106086</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202604</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Welcome to the New World</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Willkommen zur neuen Welt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bienvenue au nouveau monde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Boa vinda ao mundo novo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Benvenuto al nuovo mondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υποδοχή στο νέο κόσμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recepción al mundo nuevo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson provides students an opportunity to read and interpret writings of the late 1500's and to transfer the information provided in the writings into a visual medium as a means of understanding and interpretation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion liefert Kursteilnehmer eine 
Gelegenheit zu lesen und Schreiben des späten 1500's zu deuten und 
die Informationen zu übertragen stellten in den Schreiben in einen 
Sichtmedium als Mittel des Verstehens und der Deutung zur Verfügung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon fournit des étudiants une occasion de
lire et interpréter des écritures du 1500's en retard et transférer
l'information ont fourni dans les écritures dans un support visuel en
tant que des moyens d'arrangement et de traduction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição fornece estudantes uma oportunidade de
ler e interpretar escritas do 1500's atrasado e transferir a 
informação forneceram nas escritas em um media visual como meios da 
compreensão e da interpretação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione fornisce agli allievi un'occasione 
leggere ed interpretare le scritture del 1500's ritardato e trasferire
le informazioni hanno fornito nelle scritture in un media visivo come 
i mezzi capire e di interpretazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα παρέχει τους σπουδαστές μια ευκαιρία 
να διαβαστούν και να ερμηνευθούν οι γραφές του πρόσφατου 1500's
και να μεταφερθούν οι πληροφορίες που παρέχονται στις γραφές σε 
ένα οπτικό μέσο ως μέσο κατανόησης και ερμηνείας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección proporciona a estudiantes una 
oportunidad de leer e interpretar escrituras del último 1500's y 
transferir la información proporcionaron en las escrituras en un 
media visual como a medios de entender y de la interpretación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:BARBARA JEAN
FN:BARBARA JEAN
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202604</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106086</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/welcome-to-the-new-world</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
